pr_title: Vs refactor wire up ranges and date ranges

timeline.message: Initial wire up - tests still failing

timeline.bodyText: Is Boolean range a valid concept?
timeline.author: csoulios

replies.bodyText: That's a really good question.  I think master will let you do this, which is why I included it, but I agree it's kind of a nonsense operation. My strategy so far has been to keep these things supported for now, and after we merge have a conversation about what we want to do long term with these cases.
replies.author: not-napoleon

timeline.bodyText: Copy-paste nit: Exception message should read RangeAggregationSupplier, not HistogramAggregatorSupplier.
timeline.author: csoulios
